query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'user_profiles' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'user_profiles' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:

id	int	NO
